titles.title: To require the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission to review regulations that may affect the reliable operation of the bulk-power system.
To require the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission to review regulations that may affect the reliable operation of the bulk-power system.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 16 - 14.
